name: Miasmagus
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Miasmagus and have them choose a player. Put the Dead reminder token on the chosen player. Then, if that player is an Outsider, put the Poisoned reminder token on a Townsfolk player
ability: Each night*, choose a player; they die. When an Outsider dies this way, one Townsfolk player is poisoned until the next Outsider dies.[+1 Outsider OR +2 Stalkers]
